member.summary:
Gets or sets the attack-time (in seconds) of the effect. (default: 0.2f)
This is close to a synthesizer envelope. (See as reference)

member.name: P:CUE.NET.Effects.FlashEffect.Decay
member.summary:
Gets or sets the decay-time (in seconds) of the effect. (default: 0f)
This is close to a synthesizer envelope. (See as reference)

member.name: P:CUE.NET.Effects.FlashEffect.Sustain
member.summary:
Gets or sets the sustain-time (in seconds) of the effect. (default: 0.3f)
This is close to a synthesizer envelope. (See as reference)
Note that this value for naming reasons represents the time NOT the level.

member.name: P:CUE.NET.Effects.FlashEffect.Release
member.summary:
Gets or sets the release-time (in seconds) of the effect. (default: 0.2f)
This is close to a synthesizer envelope. (See as reference)

member.summary: Gets or sets the level at which the oppacity (percentage) should stay in the sustain-cycle. (default: 1f);

member.summary: Gets or sets the interval (in seconds) in which the effect should repeat (if repetition is enabled). (default: 1f)

member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of repetitions the effect should do until it's finished. Zero means infinite. (default: 0)
